footer:
Some commands may be used with arguments. Please, see the [link=https://github.com/blademd/thymus/wiki]documentation[/link].
Enter any command in the input field below.
modificators_header: Use any of the next sub-commands for the [bold yellow]show[/] command after a pipe symbol:

singletones.show: To show a configuration of the current path use: [bold yellow]{CMD}[/].
singletones.go: To switch the current path use: [bold yellow]{CMD}[/].
singletones.top: To switch the current path to the top use: [bold yellow]{CMD}[/].
singletones.up: To step back one or more sections use: [bold yellow]{CMD}[/].
singletones.help: To show these hints use: [bold yellow]help[/].
singletones.set: To configure the current context settings use: [bold yellow]set[/].

modificators.filter: To filter a single line from the output use: [bold yellow]{CMD}[/].
modificators.wildcard: To filter a single section from the output use: [bold yellow]{CMD}[/].
modificators.stubs: To show all finite instructions (stubs) for the current path use: [bold yellow]{CMD}[/].
modificators.sections: To list all available nested sections use: [bold yellow]{CMD}[/].
modificators.save: To save a content of the current path to a file use: [bold yellow]{CMD}[/].
modificators.count: To count lines of the output use: [bold yellow]{CMD}[/].
modificators.diff: To compare two contexts use: [bold yellow]{CMD}[/].
modificators.contains: To search a pattern in the configuration use: [bold yellow]{CMD}[/].
modificators.reveal: To show hidden passwords in the configuration use: [bold yellow]reveal[/].
